attributes.action: intervene and halt the decline in fortunes of both the English National Football team and the standard of post match interview.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the PM, and/or his ministers, lean heavily on the English Football Association and insist that current England coach Steve McClaren be immediately removed and replaced by Neil Warnock, a man capable of getting balls in the box and blaming fools on the box.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
